verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Come to my soul, blessed Jesus. newline Hear me, O Savior divine. newline Open the fountain and cleanse me. newline Give me a heart a heart like Thine.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Give me a love that knows no ill. newline Give me the grace to do Thy will. newline Pardon and cleanse this soul of mine. newline Give me a heart like Thine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Only a joy, a few brief years, newline Only a dream, a vale of tears; newline Vain is this world, I now resign. newline Give me a heart like Thine.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Open mine eyes that I may see. newline Show me the cross of Calvary. newline There may I go and not repine. newline Give me a heart like Thine.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Pillow my head upon Thy breast. newline Shelter my soul and give me rest. newline Fill me with love as I recline. newline Give me a heart like Thine.
